image.alt: Smiling patients and staff at Tyska Alexander Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Having a beautiful smile increases your self-esteem and the confidence with which you move through the world. Dr. Edwin Tyska and Dr. Kristen Alexander excel at creating incredible smiles that are healthy and becoming.

Our doctors achieve excellent clinical results because they consult together when they design a treatment plan for each patient. We have an experienced, compassionate team that will be by your side throughout treatment, focused on personalized care and clear communication so you always know what to expect.

og_meta.title: Home - Tyska Alexander Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Tyska Alexander Orthodontics provides expert orthodontic care in Clarence and Tonawanda, NY, offering Invisalign®, braces, iTero scans, and Orthopulse. Request

image.alt: Office clinician and patient smiling during consultation at Tyska Alexander Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We are committed to designing individualized, comprehensive orthodontic treatment plans that result in healthy mouths and beautiful, confident smiles. Our team works together to pay attention to the details other providers might miss, and we make patient comfort, clear communication, and excellent clinical outcomes our top priorities.
We offer complimentary consultations at our Clarence and Tonawanda offices and look forward to helping patients of all ages achieve the smile they want.

Our care includes clear and metal braces for all ages, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Invisalign Teen® clear aligners, surgical orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics, Damon™ self-ligating braces, and removable appliances for minor tooth movement.

Through thoughtful planning, modern technology, and a focus on comfort, we aim to make orthodontic care accessible and effective so every patient can leave with a healthy mouth and a smile they’re proud to share.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Tyska Alexander Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: We offer complimentary consultations at our Clarence and Tonawanda, NY orthodontic offices, which serve the greater Buffalo area. Please contact us to schedule a consultation for yourself or your child today.
The doctors and team at Tyska Alexander Orthodontics look forward to welcoming you to our practice. To request an appointment, visit our online form or call/text our office at (716) 759-8323.

image.alt: Family welcomed at Tyska Alexander Orthodontics reception
Family visiting Tyska Alexander Orthodontics

seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, new patient, consultation, Tyska Alexander Orthodontics, Clarence, Tonawanda, Buffalo

og_meta.title: Get Started | Tyska Alexander Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your smile journey with Tyska Alexander Orthodontics. Request a complimentary consultation, find our Clarence and Tonawanda locations, and schedule online

image.alt: Smiling patients in a bright, modern orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: Clear and metal braces, plus removable aligners, give adults flexible options that fit work and family life. We design treatment to minimize disruptions so you can keep doing the things you love while improving your smile.

image.alt: Smiling family enjoying time together

paragraphs.text: From traditional metal to tooth-colored ceramic systems, braces remain a reliable way to correct alignment and bite issues. We also offer Damon self-ligating options for efficient, comfortable treatment when appropriate.
Durable and cost-effective, metal braces use brackets and wires to move teeth predictably over time.

image.alt: Dental checkup with metal braces

paragraphs.text: Ceramic brackets blend with tooth color to make treatment less noticeable while delivering dependable results.

image.alt: Patient smiling with ceramic braces
Two stylish smiling teens taking a selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners use advanced 3D imaging to create a precise, removable system for many straightening cases. They can be a discreet option for adults and teenagers who prefer fewer bracket-related restrictions.
Because the aligners are removable, you can brush, floss, and eat normally during treatment. Ask us about Invisalign<sup>®</sup> or Invisalign Teen® to see if clear aligners may be right for you.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligner being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: For complex jaw and facial discrepancies, we coordinate surgical orthodontics with experienced surgeons to improve function and facial balance. Your treatment plan is carefully staged to combine orthodontic and surgical steps when surgery is indicated.
Our team plans each case with precision so the orthodontic and surgical phases work together to deliver stable, long-term results.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient receiving a surgical consultation

paragraphs.text: We use modern digital tools to make treatment more comfortable and predictable. Technology aids diagnosis, treatment planning, and patient communication at every step.
Fast, radiation-free scans capture precise 3D images to improve fit and planning for aligners and appliances.

image.alt: iTero digital scanner in use during orthodontic consultation

paragraphs.text: Adjunct technologies such as Orthopulse may be used with aligner therapy to support efficient tooth movement in select cases.

image.alt: Digital imaging equipment used for orthodontic diagnostics

paragraphs.text: Advanced software simulates stages of tooth movement so you can see a virtual preview of expected changes during treatment.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation
Modern clinic interior showing advanced equipment
Family visiting Tyska Alexander Orthodontics
